meanings.sent1: The proposer suggested a new idea for the project.
meanings.sent2: The proposer at the meeting shared their proposal with the team.
meanings.sent3: The proposer jokingly suggested having a pizza party every day.
meanings.sent4: She was the proposer of the plan that saved the company from bankruptcy.
meanings.sent5: As the proposer of the charity event, he worked tirelessly to make it a success.

meanings.definition: To put forward for consideration or acceptance.
meanings.sent1: He will proposer his plan to the board of directors tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She decided to proposer a new policy to improve customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent3: The students will proposer a fun idea for the school talent show.
meanings.sent4: The chef will proposer a unique dish for the menu next month.
meanings.sent5: They proposer a compromise to resolve the disagreement peacefully.
